name: Extreme Fast Speed Road Racer Chase - Free Arcade Car Racing
name_original: Extreme Fast Speed Road Racer Chase - Free Arcade Car Racing
description:
In a world of high speed vehicular warfare, racers are gearing up for the biggest showdown. Cars are modified with the strongest weapons to take down other racers in this epic slugfest. Do you have what it takes to claim the sole seat above everyone else?

Utilizing arcade-styled gameplay, choose your modified car of choice to take down other dangerous racers.

Compete with other racers and friends using Game Center capabilities.
